title: I blocked a another player but still found him in que
body: I blocked a player who had lost 11 ranked games in a row from feeding and playing dumb but I still found him in solo queue why is that? Does blocking someone only stop they from talking to you? I have been trying hard as to get out of bronze to get away from player's like him. Letting someone who just feeds every game play ranked is unfair to the team. My question is how do I make sure never to see this player again?

replies.body:
You can't really

I would say if anything block him and not play ranked for a while
